description.text: While developing an MVP for a young startup like GoCrowd, I had a chance to develop using modern technologies as a Next.js, Ruby on Rails. The project developed rapidly as there were daily calls, discussions. Supported the development of the platform together with the middle developer during which I was responsible for:
responsibilities: Development of forms for retail investors and business angels.
Implementation of identity verification through KYC.
Development of onboarding for start-ups on the example of Wefunder, Kickstarter.

description.text: I was involved in the development of a purchasing system for a chain of restaurants Chechil Pub. During the development, several features were made, such as requesting products through the chef, sending notifications via Telegram bot, searching for products, reporting on purchased products, etc. With the help of Wakatime, the time spent on development was actively tracked.
responsibilities: Implemented an algorithm for requesting products depending on their needs.
Invented various options for notifications through Telegram API.

description.text: Development of an educational online platform, a personal brand marathon of a well-known marketer.
responsibilities: Maintained and developed various page of components.
Developed business logic, UML modeling together with the team.
Implemented an API for creating courses and lessons, as well as an admin part, CRUD operations.
